title: Austria Retail Sales MoM
description: Retail Sales in Austria increased 3.90 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Retail Sales MoM in Austria averaged 0.13 percent from 2000 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 25.30 percent in May of 2020 and a record low of -21.70 percent in January of 2021. In Austria, the Retail sales report provides an aggregated measure of sales of retail goods and services over a specific time period. In Austria, Retail sales are seasonal, volatile and relatively important to the overall economy. This page provides the latest reported value for - Austria Retail Sales MoM - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: EUROSTAT
